description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. The LAN party smash-hit comes to the Xbox. Featuring local 8 player support, this frantic, fun-filled platformer has you escaping down a deep shaft whilst deadly saw-blades whirl ever closer to you. With over 20 characters to unlock, 4 difficulty modes and unlimited levels to play, Falldown is guaranteed to keep you and 7 friends entertained for hours - or we'll find you some new friends!
